attributes.additional_details: We seek an open debate on the humanitarian situation of refugees. In the UK plagued by an unfair and unbalanced decision system, and by society-wide prejudice that is both deliberate and systemic. We would like the extension of equal rights in employment, healthcare and access to justice to people within the asylum process; access to increased and sufficient government support established; and a full review of the competency of decision-making systems within the U.K border agency by the Joint Parliamentary Committee on Human Rights in conjunction with relevant independent parties with a view to the eradication of enforced and accidental destitution.
